snippet.title: Heroes of Hammerwatch, Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Heroes of Hammerwatch is a roguelite game taking place in the same world as Hammerwatch, released in 2013, which has sold over 1 million copies worldwide. Heroes of Hammerwatch is a "so much more" game, with a plethora of features, as seen in the trailer.

http://www.heroesofhammerwatch.com

Game is available on Steam and Gog (soon).

http://store.steampowered.com/app/677120/Heroes_of_Hammerwatch/

https://www.gog.com/game/heroes_of_hammerwatch

Crackshell Twitter for faster updates: https://twitter.com/RealCrackshell
